    Case Studies

    Real transformations. Real results. Every engagement is different, but the destination is the same: boring, reliable operations.

    Financial Services

    From 47 Incidents to 2

    A fintech startup was losing engineering velocity to constant firefighting. We implemented systematic observability and eliminated 96% of production incidents in 12 weeks.

    Compliance Without Chaos

    A healthcare company needed HIPAA compliance without destroying developer velocity. We built guardrails that enabled both. SOC 2 + HIPAA in 87 days.

    Common Patterns

    Every organizationâ€™s chaos is unique, but we see common patterns:

    Incident Fatigue Teams drowning in alerts, spending more time firefighting than building. The solution is rarely more monitoring. It is better monitoring.

    Knowledge Silos Critical systems understood by one person. Bus factor of one. The solution is systematic documentation and deliberate knowledge transfer.

    Compliance Anxiety Security and compliance seen as obstacles to velocity. The solution is infrastructure that makes the right way the easy way.

    Scale Panic Growth triggers fear instead of excitement. The solution is foundations that scale predictably.

    See Yourself in These Stories?

    Every transformation starts with understanding your current chaos. Let's talk about where you are and where you want to be.
